trigger.name: CPU usage is above warning threshold: >{$CPU_UTIL_MAX:"Device"} on {HOST.NAME}
Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Device"} on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger.name: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Device"} on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Device"} on {HOST.NAME}
